scripts.compile: node_modules/coffee-script/bin/coffee --bare --output server --compile coffeeServer && node_modules/coffee-script/bin/coffee --bare --output src --compile coffeeSrc && node_modules/coffee-script/bin/coffee --bare --output test --compile coffeeTest
scripts.test: npm run compile && node_modules/.bin/mocha --recursive --timeout 30000 `find test -name '*test.js' | sort -r`
scripts.test_cover: npm run compile && node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --recursive --timeout 30000 `find test -name '*test.js' | sort -r`
